languages.text: "Теперь мы можем быть уверены, что проблемы с {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатической{/g} связью в Просторе — не случайность. Беспокойство варпа стоит на вашем пути, Лорд-капитан, крадет сообщения и путает маршруты. Это значит, что вам необходимо как можно скорее отыскать основные миры протектората фон Валанциус — Янус, Кьяву Гамма и Даргонус. Проложить новые маршруты к мирам, вернуть над ними контроль — необходимый шаг".

traits.locale_text: "Теперь мы можем быть уверены, что проблемы с {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатической{/g} связью в Просторе — не случайность. Беспокойство варпа стоит на вашем пути, Лорд-капитан, крадет сообщения и путает маршруты. Это значит, что вам необходимо как можно скорее отыскать основные миры протектората фон Валанциус — Янус, Кьяву Гамма и Даргонус. Проложить новые маршруты к мирам, вернуть над ними контроль — необходимый шаг".

languages.text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."
languages.original_text: "Теперь мы можем быть уверены, что проблемы с {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатической{/g} связью в Просторе — не случайность. Проложить новые маршруты к мирам, вернуть над ними контроль — необходимый шаг".

traits.locale_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with astropathic communication in Koronus are not a coincidence. There is a Warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain, it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius trade empire as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

"Now we can be certain that problems with astropathic communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius trade empire as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

languages.text: «Ahora podemos confirmar que los problemas de comunicación mediante {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópatas{/g} en la Extensión de Koronus no son coincidencia. Hay una perturbación de disformidad en su camino, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Devora los mensajes y distorsiona las rutas conocidas. Eso significa que debe localizar los mundos clave del protectorado von Valancius cuanto antes. Me refiero a Janus, Dargonus y Kiava Gamma. Trazar nuevas rutas para poder llegar a ellos y restaurar el control deben ser nuestros siguientes pasos».
languages.original_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora podemos confirmar que los problemas de comunicación mediante {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópatas{/g} en la Extensión de Koronus no son coincidencia. Hay una perturbación de disformidad en su camino, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Devora los mensajes y distorsiona las rutas conocidas. Eso significa que debe localizar los mundos clave del protectorado von Valancius cuanto antes. Me refiero a Janus, Dargonus y Kiava Gamma. Trazar nuevas rutas para poder llegar a ellos y restaurar el control deben ser nuestros siguientes pasos».

languages.text: “现在可以肯定的是，科罗努斯扩区{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}的通讯问题绝对不是什么偶然现象，舰长大人。我们前进的航线受到了亚空间的干扰，它会吞噬通讯信息，扰乱我们熟悉的航线。也就是说，您需要尽快找到冯·瓦兰修斯王朝麾下的重要世界——加努斯、达戈努斯、基亚瓦伽马星，绘制新的航线前往这些行星。只有这样，我们才能抵达这些区域，恢复对它们的掌控。”
languages.original_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

traits.locale_text: “现在可以肯定的是，科罗努斯星域{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}的通讯问题绝对不是什么偶然现象，舰长大人。我们前进的航线受到了亚空间的干扰，它会吞噬通讯信息，扰乱我们熟悉的航线。也就是说，您需要尽快找到冯·瓦兰修斯王朝麾下的重要世界——加努斯、达戈努斯、基亚瓦伽马星，绘制新的航线前往这些行星。只有这样，我们才能抵达这些区域，恢复对它们的掌控。”

languages.text: 「これで、コロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}の通信障害は偶然のものではないことがはっきりしましたね。ロード・キャプテン、この先は歪みが邪魔をしてきます。メッセージを飲み込んで、慣れたルートもかき乱してくるでしょう。つまり、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の要となる惑星をできるだけ早く見つけなければいけません。ええ、ヤヌス、ダルゴナス、キアヴァ・ガンマのことです。惑星到着を目指して、新たなルートを割り出し、しっかり舵を取ることが次のステップに必要かと」
languages.original_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

traits.locale_text: 「これで、コロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}の通信障害は偶然のものではないことがはっきりしましたね。ロード・キャプテン、この先は歪みが邪魔をしてきます。メッセージを飲み込んで、慣れたルートもかき乱してくるでしょう。つまり、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の要となる惑星をできるだけ早く見つけなければいけません。ええ、ヤヌス、ダルゴナス、キアヴァ・ガンマのことです。惑星到着を目指して、新たなルートを割り出し、しっかり舵を取ることが次のステップに必要かと」

languages.text: "Wir sind jetzt sicher, dass die Probleme mit der {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathischen{/g} Kommunikation in der Koronus-Ausdehnung kein Zufall sind. Euch steht eine Warp-Störung im Weg, Lord Captain – sie verschluckt Nachrichten und stört bekannte Routen. Das bedeutet, Ihr müsst die Hauptwelten des Protektorats von Valancius so schnell wie möglich ausfindig machen – ich spreche von Janus, Dargonus und Kiava Gamma. Neue Routen, um sie zu erreichen, und die Wiederherstellung der Kontrolle sind der erforderliche nächste Schritt."
languages.original_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind jetzt sicher, dass die Probleme mit der {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathischen{/g} Kommunikation in der Koronus-Ausdehnung kein Zufall sind. Euch steht eine Warp-Störung im Weg, Lord Captain – sie verschluckt Nachrichten und stört bekannte Routen. Das bedeutet, Ihr müsst die Hauptwelten des Protektorats von Valancius so schnell wie möglich ausfindig machen – ich spreche von Janus, Dargonus und Kiava Gamma. Neue Routen, um sie zu erreichen, und die Wiederherstellung der Kontrolle sind der erforderliche nächste Schritt."

languages.text: « Il est maintenant clair que les problèmes de communication {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathique{/g} dans les Étendues de Koronus ne sont pas une simple coïncidence. Une anomalie du Warp se dresse sur votre chemin, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Elle avale les messages et perturbe les itinéraires établis. Pour y remédier, vous allez devoir commencer par localiser les mondes clés du protectorat des von Valancius au plus vite. Je parle de Janus, Dargonus et Kiava Gamma. Ensuite, il nous faudra tracer de nouveaux itinéraires pour les atteindre, puis en reprendre le contrôle. »
languages.original_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

traits.locale_text: « Il est maintenant clair que les problèmes de communication {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathique{/g} dans les Étendues de Koronus ne sont pas une simple coïncidence. Une anomalie du Warp se dresse sur votre chemin, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Elle avale les messages et perturbe les itinéraires établis. Pour y remédier, vous allez devoir commencer par localiser les mondes clés du protectorat des von Valancius au plus vite. Je parle de Janus, Dargonus et Kiava Gamma. Ensuite, il nous faudra tracer de nouveaux itinéraires pour les atteindre, puis en reprendre le contrôle. »

languages.text: "Artık Koronus Enginliği'ndeki {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropatik{/g} iletişim sorunlarının tesadüf olmadığını kesin olarak söyleyebiliriz. Önünüzde bir öteboyut bozunumu var Lord Kaptan. Mesajları yutup bilindik rotaları bozuyor. Bu da von Valancius protektorasındaki en mühim dünyaların konumlarını bir an evvel tespit etmenizi şart koşuyor. Janus, Dargonus ve Kiava Gama'dan söz ediyorum. Bir sonraki adımımız, yeni rotalar çizip onları ulaşılabilir kılmak ve hâkimiyeti yeniden sağlamak olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Now we can be certain that problems with {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathic{/g} communication in the Koronus Expanse are no coincidence. There is a warp disturbance in your way, Lord Captain — it is swallowing messages and disrupting familiar routes. This means you need to locate the key worlds of the von Valancius protectorate as soon as possible — I am talking about Janus, Dargonus, and Kiava Gamma. Charting new routes so they can be reached and restoring control will be the necessary next step."

traits.locale_text: "Koronus Enginliği'ndeki {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropatik{/g} iletişim sorunlarının tesadüf olmadığını kesin olarak söyleyebiliriz bu durumda. Önünüzde bir öteboyut bozunumu var Lord Kaptan. Mesajları yutuyor ve bilindik rotaları bozuyor. Bu da demek oluyor ki von Valancius protektorasının anahtar önem taşıyan dünyalarını mümkün olan en kısa sürede tespit etmelisiniz. Janus, Dargonus ve Kiava Gama'dan söz ediyorum. Bir sonraki adımımız yeni rotalar çizip onları ulaşılabilir kılmak ve kontrolü yeniden sağlamak olmalı."
